name: Starcatcher (itch) (Wesdras)
description:
In Starcatcher, you must collect Star and destroy enemy portals to advance in a maze like game. Collect enough Starchips to upgrade your Spaceship "Stellar". If you like classiccs like Pac Man and Fantasy Zone Maze, this is for you.

There only 5 stages with the potential to have more, with more variety in enemies and gameplay.
